  • All Superinterfaces:

    • Method Detail

      • fullTextSearch

        java.util.List<Ad> fullTextSearch(FullTextAdQuery query)
                                  throws DaoException
        Searches for Ads using a full text search, sorting results by relevance. The searched fields using keywords are:
        • title
        • description
        • custom fields
        • owner name
        • owner username
        • owner email
        • owner custom fields
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • getCategoriesWithCounters

        java.util.List<AdCategoryWithCounterVO> getCategoriesWithCounters(java.util.List<AdCategory> categories,
                                                                AdCategoryWithCounterQuery query)
        Returns the counters for each of the given ad category, given the ad query

      • getNumberOfAds

        java.lang.Integer getNumberOfAds(java.util.Calendar date,
                               java.util.Collection<? extends Group> groups,
                               Ad.Status status)
                                 throws DaoException
        Get the number of ads of the given status and at the given date, and with the member belonging to the given group.
        Parameters:
        date - usually the enddate of a period
        groups - a Collection containing the group of which the number of ads is requested. If this is an empty collection, the param is ignored.
        status - the ad status requested
        Returns:
        an Integer with the number of ads.
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • getNumberOfCreatedAds

        java.lang.Integer getNumberOfCreatedAds(Period period,
                                      java.util.Collection<? extends Group> groups)
                                        throws DaoException
        Get the number of ads created in the given period
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • getNumberOfMembersWithAds

        java.lang.Integer getNumberOfMembersWithAds(java.util.Calendar date,
                                          java.util.Collection<? extends Group> groups)
                                            throws DaoException
        Get the number of active members with ads at the given date, and with the member belonging to the given groups.
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • search

        java.util.List<Ad> search(AdQuery queryParameters)
                          throws DaoException
        Searches for Ads. The results are expected to be ordered by publication start descending, or randomly if randomOrder is true on the query parameters. If no entity can be found, returns an empty list. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.
        Throws:
        DaoException
